RESIINTE: Walk in Closet,Pantry,Ceiling Fan,Master Bdrm Mn Level,Range/Oven,Refrigerator,Dishwasher,Washer/Dryer
MarketingRemarks: Looking for a well maintained home in the country? This is it! Full city block on its own well and septic. Large shop doubles as a garage. Flat, useable lot is nicely landscaped. Paved street in the heart of Silver Lake.

10% deeded co-ownership in a fully-furnished, beautifully decorated townhome with onsite management, resort club w/pool, spa, tennis court, exercise room & clubhouse. Two bedroom, 2.5 bath rental option home. Hickory cabinets, tile floors & counter tops, cozy gas fireplace in vaulted living room. Lovely setting with view of pond & waterfall. Carefree townhome ownership, conveniently located close to Sunriver Village Mall. Weeks can be rented, used or traded w/RCI.

Great opportunity to own 12 wks of annual usage in an RCI Gold Crown Resort in Sunriver., Deeded co-ownership in a downstairs rental unit. Nicely updated unit, with tiled floors in  entry, kitchen, hall & baths, new: carpet, furnishings countertops & stainless appliances. Open floor plan with Basalt Rock gas frpl in living room, wet bar, spacious master suite w/Jacuzzi tub. Ideally located close to Sunriver Village Mall & SHARC. Pool, hot tub, tennis, crt & rec room. SHARC assessment paid in full.

Charming mid-town ranch home with lots of character. Owners are artists and have added their special touch to this property. Hardwood floors, open floor plan and remodeled kitchen with concrete counters. Light and bright sunroom. Spacious lot with raised garden beds and blooming perennials!
Comps only. Sold.

Beautiful home sitting on 7.15 acres.  Large living area with vaulted ceiling and adjacent sunken family room.  Kitchen features lots of tile work and comes equipped with all appliances.  Large bedrooms with laundry room conveniently located close to the bedrooms.  Private den with dry bar in daylight basement.  Extra large detached garage.  Big  concrete basketball court.  40' x 60' shop with extra high door access for motor home or boat.  This is an amazing opportunity for affordable country living.

Awesome recreation/living in the heart of Oregon's Ochoco foothills. Just 45 minutes East of Prineville, OR. Easy access to HWY 26 - pavement to the gate! Perfect for recreation or full-time living. Views galore and lots of room to roam. Perfect for horses. LOP tags may be available and there are plenty of deer and elk. Town of Mitchell is just 10 minutes away. Gorgeous scenery from the front porch. Check this one out!

RESIINTE: Master Bdrm Mn Level,2 Master Bedrooms,Range/Oven,Refrigerator,Dishwasher,Security System,Microwave,Disposal,Washer/Dryer
MarketingRemarks: Unobstructed views of the Cascades & surrounding valley farmland in this immaculate 4BR, 4.5BA home on 1.56 acres. Updated kitchen & baths, generous living and entertaining spaces both inside & out. Open beam ceilings, extensive view windows, custom built-ins, tremendous storage, lower level rec room with bar, 3 fireplaces. Comfortable outdoor spaces with view decks & private patio spaces. Detached guest house/studio has its own full bath & shop space. Gas FA + AC, security & sprinkler systems.

One of the finer lots in East Meadow at 1.45 acres with huge ponderosa trees and not far from store, horse stables, post office and welcome center. New wireles internet just added. Unique 2 story home with lots of mountain charm. Own a piece of BBR for 1/4 the price as this is a 1/4 fractional share.

MarketingRemarks: Price Reduction! Water rights found! 431 Acre Ranch w/5.7 acres IRRIGATION RIGHTS in Sunny Central Oregon. Private valley w/large game, abundant wildlife & seasonal creek. This multi terrain fenced & cross fenced property boasts: pristine valley, mountain, & open sky views; a horse barn w/stalls, tack room, and hay storage; & large detached double garage/shop. Well maintained Super Good Cents Energy Certified 2640 home boasts extra large cooks kitchen w/butler pantry & a spacious master suite w/soaker tub.

Privately tucked between the Crosswater golf course and 400 feet of the Big Deschutes River lies one of the most extraordinary estates in Central Oregon. Behind the mahogany gate lies a manicured 2.8 acre lot and a 7,991 sq. ft. estate home. A log-truss portico and basalt fountain welcome you into the home featuring 4 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms, indoor lap pool, rec. room, covered decks overlooking the river, and 7-car garage. Lot also is home to an 800 Sq Ft accessory building & private boat dock.
